scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc --rootDir src --outDir dist --module CommonJS --target es6 --skipLibCheck && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp README.md dist/README.md && cp LICENSE dist/LICENSE
scripts.build:tsr: ts-node ./src/bin/index src/index src/lib/index src/bin/index src/bin/process --moduleAlias --compilerOptions '{"outDir": "dist-tsr", "strictNullChecks": false, "moduleResolution": "Node", "module": "commonjs", "target": "ES2015", "lib": ["ESNext"]}'
scripts.build:tsr:fast: ts-node ./src/bin/index src/index src/lib/index src/bin/index src/bin/process --fast --moduleAlias --compilerOptions '{"outDir": "dist-tsr", "strictNullChecks": false, "moduleResolution": "Node", "module": "commonjs", "target": "ES2015", "lib": ["ESNext"]}'
